alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Montrose County through 700 PM MDT... At 632 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Norwood, or 23 miles west of Montrose, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Montrose County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
